thread.title: BRIEF-Vestate Group Says Unit To Sell ‍Properties For Hk$150 Mln To Purcahsers

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Vestate Group Says Unit To Sell ‍Properties For Hk$150 Mln To Purcahsers

organizations.name: brief-vestate group says unit to sell ‍properties

text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Vestate Group Holdings Ltd:
* APPLICATION MADE TO STOCK EXCHANGE FOR RESUMPTION OF TRADING IN SHARES ON STOCK EXCHANGE WITH EFFECT FROM 9:00 A.M. ON 8 FEB
* SEES ‍GAIN OF HK$31.3 MILLION FROM DISPOSAL​ * UNIT TO SELL ‍ PROPERTIES FOR HK$150 MILLION TO PURCAHSERS ​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
